subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription:
"Sugar, spice and everything nice
These were the ingredients chosen
To create the perfect little girls
But Professor Utonium accidentally
Added an extra ingredient to the concoction Chemical X
Thus the Powerpuff girls were born
Using their ultra-super powers
Blossom, Bubbles and Buttercup
Have dedicated their lives to fighting crime
And the forces of evil"   - "Powerpuff Girls"

If you think you’ve got what it takes to analyze mysterious concoctions and discover the Chemical X, then Breakdown is where you ought to be. We take you on a journey by brushing your skills in basic

Forensics, Archaeology, Extra-terrestrial life, Zombies; the previous editions have explored it all. Engineer 2014 promises a yet another nerve crackling theme. Get through the intricacies of our prelims and we'll let you have fun with the potions! sciences (Spoiler: Chemistry) and tickling your brain cells to introducing you to a whole new perspective of ‘The science of matter’.

list.title: Rules and Regulations
items: A team can have a maximum of 2 people.
Both members of the team are to be enrolled as students in an educational institute.
No person can be a part of more than 1 team.
There is no restriction on the number of people participating from a particular institute.

list.title: Rounds
items: First round will comprise of a Written Quiz testing concepts of Chemistry (+2 Level) and General Science.
Selected teams will get to solve the hands on puzzle, working in the Chemistry Laboratory.
This being a spot event, the problem statement will be released on the event day itself.

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription: Problem statement will be provided and based on that a model needs to be constructed that must satisfy the problem specification. Teams of two or three participate and build a model. Last year’s event involved a construction of a Vortex scanner which must shoot down a castle of paper cups using smoke.

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription: An industry provides a problem statement, which they might be facing or have faced. Groups of two or three participate and present their solution in front of industry personnel. This is a sponsored event, where the industry providing the problem gives the prize money. The company benefits as they get the solution for the problem.

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription: A two day Technology Orientation Workshop on Industry Perspective on Chemical Process Design, Operations and Control conducted by Institute of Process and Control Engineers (IPCE).

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription:
Get ready for some intense quizzing- Chemical events, Engineer 2014 brings you yet another edition of the online quiz!!

Covering all domains of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, from the history of discoveries and inventions to the magic of reactions and the arena of industries, the quiz runs for 7 days starting from 1th of October 2014, with a question per day. The top three fastest correct answers on each day will be awarded 25, 15 and 10 points respectively. The cumulative leaders at the end of the 7 day period will be declared winners.

Stay tuned to the pages mentioned below to get to know what more is in store for this edition of the online quiz.

https://www.facebook.com/EngineerNITK
https://www.facebook.com/ChemicalEventsEngineer
